channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 视频：数百名裸体男子为争夺一袋木制护身符而大打出手，为日本一个有着千年历史的仪式画上了戏剧性的句号。相扑 "节受到了日本人口老龄化危机的影响。
item.description: VIDEO: Hundreds of naked men tussle over a bag of wooden talismans, performing a dramatic end to a thousand-year-old ritual in Japan that took place for the last time. The "Sominsai" festival is impacted by the country's ageing population crisis.

item.title: R to @AFP：#最新消息 被监禁的俄罗斯反对派政治家伊利亚-雅辛（Ilya Yashin）在得知他的朋友和同事、克里姆林宫批评家阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼（Alexei Navalny）死于狱中后，于周二发誓要继续为俄罗斯的民主而战。
item.description:
#UPDATE Jailed Russian opposition politician Ilya Yashin vowed on Tuesday to continue fighting for democracy in Russia after learning his friend and colleague, Kremlin critic Alexei Navalny, had died in prison.
u.afp.com/5Nha

item.title: 委内瑞拉总统尼古拉-马杜罗誓言禁止美国石油巨头埃克森美孚公司进入埃塞奎博石油富集区附近的水域，加拉加斯声称圭亚那将该地区据为己有。
item.description:
Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro has vowed to bar US petroleum giant ExxonMobil from the waters off the oil-rich region of Essequibo, which Caracas claims from Guyana as its own.
u.afp.com/5Nhu

item.title: R to @AFP：#最新消息：瑞典周二表示，它将向乌克兰提供价值 71 亿克朗（6.82 亿美元）的军事装备，这对正在努力抵御俄罗斯入侵的乌克兰来说是一个鼓舞。
item.description:
#UPDATE Sweden said Tuesday it would give 7.1 billion kronor ($682 million) worth of military equipment to Ukraine, in a boost for the country as it struggles to fight off Russia's invasion.
u.afp.com/5Nhb

item.title: 一名工会代表告诉法新社，世界顶级旅游景点之一的埃菲尔铁塔将在周二连续第二天关闭，因为工作人员延长了罢工时间。
item.description:
The Eiffel Tower, one of the world's top tourist attractions, will remain closed for a second straight day Tuesday as staff extend a strike, a union representative told AFP.
u.afp.com/5NhB

item.title: 视频：阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼（Alexei Navalny）的遗孀尤利娅-纳瓦尔娜亚（Yulia Navalnaya）指控弗拉基米尔-普京总统杀害了她的丈夫，并承诺将 "点名道姓 "地揭露那些她声称对纳瓦尔尼的死负有责任的人。
item.description: VIDEO: Alexei Navalny's widow Yulia Navalnaya accuses President Vladimir Putin of killing her husband and promises to "name names and show faces" of those she claims are responsible for his death, three days after Navalny died in an Arctic prison.

item.title:
荷兰风力发电船驶向更加绿色的未来。
世界上第一艘装有巨型硬铝 "风帆 "的化学品油轮已驶离鹿特丹，其船东希望为减少航运业的巨大碳足迹开辟一条道路
item.description:
Wind-powered Dutch ship sets sail for greener future.

The world's first chemical tanker ship fitted with massive rigid aluminium "sails" has left Rotterdam, its owner hoping to plot a route to bringing down the shipping industry's huge carbon footprint

u.afp.com/5NnC

item.title:
实验室培育的钻石给天然宝石带来了压力。
闪闪发光的钻石闪烁着同样的光芒，但也有关键的区别：开采出来的天然宝石已有十多亿年的历史，而实验室制造的宝石则是新的，价格还不到天然宝石的一半。
item.description:
Lab-grown diamonds put natural gems under pressure.

The glittering diamonds sparkle the same but there are key differences: mined natural gems are more than a billion years old, while laboratory-made rocks are new and cost less than half the price

u.afp.com/5NnH

item.title:
R to @AFP：未来十年，澳大利亚计划将其战舰舰队扩大一倍，并将国防开支再增加 70 亿美元。
其中包括六艘猎人级护卫舰、三艘空战驱逐舰和六艘最先进的水面战舰。
item.description:
Over the next decade Australia plans to double its fleet of warships and boost defence spending by an additional US$7 billion.

Among the new ships will be six Hunter class frigates, three air warfare destroyers and six state-of-the-art surface warships

u.afp.com/5Nnx

item.title:
R to @AFP：#在得知他的朋友和同事、克里姆林宫批评家阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼（Alexei Navalny）死于狱中后，被监禁的俄罗斯反对派政治家伊利亚-雅辛（Ilya Yashin）周二发誓要继续为俄罗斯的自由而战。
"只要我的心脏还在跳动，我就会与暴政作斗争。只要我还活着，我就不怕任何邪恶，"雅辛在社交媒体上发帖说，他承认自己的生命 "掌握在普京手中，而且正处于危险之中"。
item.description:
#UPDATE Jailed Russian opposition politician Ilya Yashin on Tuesday vowed to continue fighting for Russia's freedom after learning that his friend and colleague, Kremlin critic Alexei Navalny, had died in prison.

"As long as my heart beats in my chest, I will fight tyranny. As long as I live, I will fear no evil," Yashin said in a post on social media, acknowledging that his own life "is in Putin's hands and it's in danger"

item.title: R to @AFP：视频： 中国首架国产客机 C919 在亚洲最大的航空盛会新加坡航展上首次国际亮相
item.description: VIDEO: China's first domestically produced passenger jet C919 makes its international debut at the Singapore Airshow, the largest aviation event in Asia

item.title: R to @AFP：#BREAKING Jailed Russian activist Yashin says will keep 'fighting tyranny' after Navalny death.
item.description: #BREAKING Jailed Russian activist Yashin says will keep 'fighting tyranny' after Navalny death

item.title: R to @AFP：#瑞典表示将向乌克兰提供创纪录的 6.82 亿美元军事援助
item.description: #BREAKING Sweden says to give Ukraine record military aid of $682 million

item.title:
R to @AFP：#一位执政党高级官员说，匈牙利是瑞典申请加入北约的最后一个坚持国，它将在周一就这一问题进行投票。
菲德斯议会党团领袖马特-科奇什（Mate Kocsis）周二在脸书上说，他已要求议长 "2024 年 2 月 26 日的会议议程应包括......就宣布瑞典王国加入北大西洋公约组织的议定书进行最后表决，我们的议会党团打算支持该议定书"。
item.description:
#UPDATE Hungary, the last holdout on Sweden's bid to join NATO, will vote on the issue on Monday, a senior ruling party official says.

Mate Kocsis, Fidesz parliamentary group leader, said on Tuesday on Facebook that he had asked the speaker that "the session of 26 February 2024 shall include on its agenda the final vote... on the proclamation of the Protocol of Accession of the Kingdom of Sweden to the North Atlantic Treaty, which our parliamentary group intends to support"

item.title: #执政党称匈牙利将于周一就瑞典申办北约进行投票
item.description: #BREAKING Hungary to vote on Swedish NATO bid on Monday, says ruling party

item.title:
资深捷克人将完善维基百科作为退休后的业余爱好。
一位 80 岁的退休老人并不符合每个人心目中精通技术的维基百科作家的形象，但 Jirina Kadnerova 却是在线百科全书的忠实贡献者
item.description:
Senior Czechs refine Wikipedia as retirement hobby.

An 80-year-old retiree does not fit everyone's idea of a tech-savvy Wikipedia writer, but Jirina Kadnerova is a devoted contributor to the online encyclopedia

u.afp.com/5NnM

item.title:
R to @AFP：周二，以色列对加沙发动了新一轮空袭，世界各国正努力在联合国安理会投票前促成停火。
联合国警告说，粮食短缺可能导致可预防的儿童死亡 "爆炸性增长
item.description:
Israel hit Gaza with new air strikes on Tuesday as world powers grappled with how to broker a ceasefire ahead of a UN Security Council vote.

The UN has warned that food shortages could lead to an "explosion" of preventable child deaths

u.afp.com/5Nnn

item.title: 本周二，数百名实习医生停止工作，抗议医疗培训改革，韩国医院拒绝接收部分病人，并推迟手术。
item.description:
South Korean hospitals turned away some patients and delayed surgeries on Tuesday as hundreds of trainee doctors stopped working in a protest against medical training reforms

u.afp.com/5NnN

item.title: 乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelensky）说，乌克兰军队因失去一座重镇而溃不成军，目前在与俄罗斯交战的前线面临着 "极其困难 "的条件，原因是外国援助被推迟了
item.description:
Ukrainian troops, reeling from the loss of a key town, now face "extremely difficult" conditions all along the frontline with Russia because of delayed foreign aid, President Volodymyr Zelensky says

u.afp.com/5NnQ

item.title: R to @AFP：数十名俄罗斯人在警察的严密监视下，在莫斯科的一座纪念碑前献花悼念阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼，尽管自这位反对派偶像宣布去世以来，数百人遭到逮捕
item.description:
Dozens of Russians, closely watched by police, have left flower tributes at a Moscow monument to honour the memory of Alexei Navalny despite hundreds of arrests in the days since the opposition icon's death was announced

u.afp.com/5Nn4

item.title:
中国制造客机在新加坡航展上寻找买家。
中国政府希望通过 C919 飞机挑战顶级飞机制造商空中客车公司和波音公司长达数十年的主导地位，同时减少对外国技术的依赖。
item.description:
Made-in-China airliner seeks buyers at Singapore Airshow.

With its C919 aircraft, Beijing wants to challenge the decades-long dominance of top plane-makers Airbus and Boeing while reducing its reliance on foreign technology

u.afp.com/5Nnp

item.title: 视频： 世界顶级旅游景点之一的巴黎埃菲尔铁塔因员工罢工而关闭。工会称，此次罢工是为了抗议纪念碑的财务管理方式，罢工可能会延长。
item.description: VIDEO: The Eiffel Tower in Paris, one of the world's top tourist attractions, is closed after staff went on strike. The strike, which was called to protest over the way the monument is managed financially, could be extended, unions say

item.title:
以色列抗议者阻挡前往加沙的援助车队。
就在饱受战争蹂躏的加沙地带面临饥荒威胁的时候，以色列抗议者却一再聚集起来，阻止急需的援助物资进入巴勒斯坦领土。
item.description:
Israeli protesters block aid convoys bound for Gaza.

Even as the threat of famine stalks the war-ravaged Gaza Strip, Israeli protesters have gathered repeatedly to stop desperately needed aid from getting into the Palestinian territory

u.afp.com/5NnU

item.title: 阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的遗孀指责弗拉基米尔-普京总统杀害了她的丈夫，并发誓要在他上周死于俄罗斯北极监狱后继续他毕生的事业。
item.description:
Alexei Navalny's widow has accused President Vladimir Putin of killing her husband and vowed to continue his life's work following his death last week in a Russian Arctic prison

u.afp.com/5Nsr

item.title:
R to @AFP：#最新消息：澳大利亚周二概述了一项长达十年的计划，即在亚太军备竞赛加速的情况下，将其战舰舰队增加一倍，并将国防开支再增加 70 亿美元。
根据该计划，澳大利亚海军的主要水面作战舰艇将从目前的 11 艘增加到 26 艘。
"国防部长理查德-马尔斯（Richard Marles）说："这将是自第二次世界大战结束以来我们拥有的最大舰队。
item.description:
#UPDATE Australia on Tuesday outlined a decade-long plan to double its fleet of warships and boost defence spending by an additional US$7 billion, in the face of a quickening Asia-Pacific arms race.

Under the plan, Australia will get a navy of 26 major surface combatant ships, up from 11 today.

"It is the largest fleet that we will have since the end of the Second World War," says Defence Minister Richard Marles

item.title:
R to @AFP：#最新消息：中国央行周二下调了用于抵押贷款定价的关键基准贷款利率，因为中国政府正寻求提振疲软的经济增长，并对抗其他主要经济体的加息。
中国人民银行宣布，五年期贷款最优惠利率（LPR）从4.2降至3.95。作为企业贷款基准的一年期贷款优惠利率保持在 3.45% 不变。
item.description:
#UPDATE China's central bank on Tuesday cut a key benchmark lending rate used to price mortgages, as Beijing seeks to boost flagging growth and counter rate hikes in other major economies.

The five-year loan prime rate (LPR) was lowered from 4.2 to 3.95, the People's Bank of China announced. The one-year LPR, which serves as a benchmark for corporate loans, remained unchanged at 3.45%

item.title: #中国央行下调基准贷款利率提振经济
item.description: #BREAKING China central bank cuts benchmark lending rate to boost economy

item.title: R to @AFP：以色列军方公布了新的图片，并表达了对一位母亲和她的两个儿子的担忧，其中包括一名婴儿，他是在加沙被巴勒斯坦武装分子扣押的年龄最小的人质。
item.description: Israel's military published new images and voiced concern about a mother and her two boys -- including a baby who is the youngest hostage held by Palestinian militants in Gaza. u.afp.com/5NeQ

item.title: 美国职业棒球大联盟华盛顿国民队（Washington Nationals）的主要所有者马克-勒纳（Mark Lerner）表示，在近两年的时间里，该队一直没有达成交易，因此不再出售。
item.description:
Major League Baseball's Washington Nationals are no longer for sale after nearly two years available without a deal, principal owner Mark Lerner said.

u.afp.com/5Ne7

item.title: #澳大利亚公布耗资 70 亿美元的海军改造计划
item.description: #BREAKING Australia unveils US$7 billion plan to overhaul navy
